question_text: In this contact, you will be asked up to four questions. Please check the answers that best describe your oral health behavior.
I believe that I can take care of my teeth as described in the ROBAS coaching.
The ROBAS training was helpful in clarifying how to use the ROBAS kit.
I am satisfied with how easy it is to use the ROBAS kit.
I believe it will be easy to take care of my teeth as described in the ROBAS coaching.
Thank you for answering this Survey. Please click "FINISH".
